test_module.name: ${WASSP_TC_NAME}
test_module.test_case:
####################################################### # CPE Sanity test case #######################################################
FAILIF Fail PASSIF Pass SET PYTHON /home/svc-cgcsauto/wassp-repos/.venv_wassp/bin/python3
CALL export PYTHONPATH=${PYTHONPATH}:/home/svc-cgcsauto/wassp-repos/testcases/cgcs/CGCSAuto
CALL ${PYTHON} -m pytest -v -s --junit-xml=${WASSP_TC_RUN_LOG}/result.xml --result-log=${WASSP_TC_RUN_LOG}/test.log ${WASSP_TESTCASE_DIR}/../CGCSAuto/testcases/mtc/test_system_alarm_show/test_system_alarm_list.py::test_1443_system_alarm_list PASS
